description: Cruis'n USA Nintendo front label very worn Slam the pedal to the metal and hang on for a wild race across the highways of America. Catch all the roadside scenery and famous landmarks - from San Francisco's Golden Gate Bridge South Dakota's Mount Rushmore to the rolling hills of Appalachia. Nintendo 64 Classic Fun Racing Game Nintendo 64 Game
